oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition B.P.O.E. pin, 1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Appalachian Exposition B.P.O.E. pin, 1910. Copper / metal pin with Tennessee-shaped top (embossed: ’B.P.O.E. Knoxville 160. Detroit Reunion 1910) linked to rectangular embossed bottom with AE in white, ‘Appalachian Exposition Knoxville, Tenn.’ ‘COME TO KNOXVILLE IN 1910’ and elk head at lower right. B.P.O.E. = Benevolent and Protective Order of Elks (also know as Elks Lodge). On back: Grenduck Co., Chicago. C clasp on back. Overall size of both parts: 2 1/4 x 2.” 1 pc. Artifact 2012.003
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Exhibitions; Fraternal organizations; Badges;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
